results.content:
This a very good course,   and the instructor follows a very good teaching style.  The only drawback [just me only] 
is that the 2 main projects included in the course are Framework driven (REACT/Android)  instead of just vanilla HTML/JS.  I know I can import the REACT project and so forth, but I still believe including full scale framework muddies the teaching objectives of this course.  for future enhancement I would recommend including or adding a simpler Bootstrap/HTML/AJAX/JQUERY type project to illustrate the FastApi concepts in action.   As for now, I will probably just skip the (REACT/Android) projects and try something like HTMX which is HTML driven.   In any case, as far a FASTAPI is concerned, this is an excellent course and deserve 5 stars for effort and clarity.  Thank you.
results.content_html:
This a very good course, and the instructor follows a very good teaching style. The only drawback [just me only]
is that the 2 main projects included in the course are Framework driven (REACT/Android) instead of just vanilla HTML/JS. I know I can import the REACT project and so forth, but I still believe including full scale framework muddies the teaching objectives of this course. for future enhancement I would recommend including or adding a simpler Bootstrap/HTML/AJAX/JQUERY type project to illustrate the FastApi concepts in action. As for now, I will probably just skip the (REACT/Android) projects and try something like HTMX which is HTML driven. In any case, as far a FASTAPI is concerned, this is an excellent course and deserve 5 stars for effort and clarity. Thank you.
